Appendix B
==========

Portfolio Categories
--------------------

* AGNs
* Asteroids
* Binaries
* Black Holes
* Blazars
* Cataclysmic Variables
* Comets
* Cosmic Rays
* Gamma-ray Bursts
* Globular Clusters
* Gravitational Waves
* Meteors
* Microlensing Events
* Minor Planets
* Near-Earth Objects
* Neutrinos
* Neutron Stars
* Novas
* Planets
* Pulsars
* Quasars
* Stellar
* Supernovae
* The Sun
* Transients
* Variables

Event Categories (mostly for ATels)
-----------------------------------
* potentially hazardous asteroid
* binary
* black hole
* blazar
* cataclysmic variable
* comet
* cosmic rays
* gamma-ray burst
* soft gamma-ray repeater
* globular cluster
* gravitational waves
* meteor
* microlensing event
* planet (minor)
* near-earth object
* neutrinos
* neutron star
* nova
* planet
* pulsar
* quasar
* pre-main-sequence star
* star
* young stellar object
* supernovae
* supernova remnant
* the sun
* transient
* variables
